metadata.title: CVE-2024-42158 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:s390/pkey: Use kfree_sensitive() to fix Coccinelle warningsReplace memzero_explicit() and kfree() with kfree_sensitive() to fixwarnings reported by Coccinelle:WARNING opportunity for kfree_sensitive/kvfree_sensitive (line 1506)WARNING opportunity for kfree_sensitive/kvfree_sensitive (line 1643)WARNING opportunity for kfree_sensitive/kvfree_sensitive (line 1770)
